table.caption: Boros Assignments
rows: Help quell a {@creature Rakdos|GGR} riot or hold back Gruul raiders, or otherwise maintain the peace while protecting innocent bystanders.
Capture or kill a Gruul chieftain who has taken responsibility for a series of brutal raids.
Help evacuate citizens from the area of a natural or magical disaster.
Escort an important person safely from one place to another.
Investigate a Boros commander suspected of cultivating personal loyalty in underlings, rather than loyalty to the legion.
Uncover a spy in the legion.
